author: 3esmit.stateofus.eth
content:
I am looking on ETH2 to support governance inchain from ERC20 tokens held in L1 accounts. Is this possible? 

If not, could the ETH2 have support to the L1 state merkle root on a current block? So my governance contract could snapshot the merkle root and do the tabulation in top of that. 
This might also work for ENS subdomains in L2.
